response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("Age at first arrest", "high", "At 18, this individual is considered an adult and has already demonstrated a propensity for criminal behavior."),
    ("Number of prior arrests/convictions", "high", "Three arrests and convictions indicate a pattern of criminal activity."),
    ("Education level", "high", "Lack of a high school diploma or GED suggests limited life skills and potential for unemployment."),
    ("Employment history", "high", "No job history during the year indicates financial instability and lack of productive engagement."),
    ("Substance use", "medium", "Past drug use, including cocaine, is a risk factor. Recent feelings of depression also suggest potential for substance abuse to cope with negative emotions."),
    ("Family background (size and rural upbringing)", "low", "While living in a large family and rural area may have influenced his early life, these factors alone do not predict future criminal behavior."),
    ("Religious beliefs (atheism)", "low", "His atheistic views do not directly correlate with an increased likelihood of reoffending.")
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 85
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is an 18-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 3 times and has been convicted. He is 6 feet 0 inches and weighs 135 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He does not have a high school diploma or GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held no jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana and cocaine) and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 6, in a rural area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
